revision.text:
'''Protein''' is a consumable item which can be purchased from each [[Region|region's]] League, or traded for [[Berries]] with the [[Berry Master]] of each region from [[Johto]] onwards. It can be fed to a Pokémon to increase the amount of attack that Pokémon gains by 1 per protein per hatch. Each Pokémon can consume a total of 5 proteins per unlocked region. =How to Use= Go to Start Menu > Items > Item Bag, select the protein and select a Pokémon to use it on. Once used, the effect is permanent and cannot be removed by any means. =New Efficiency= Below is a list of the most efficient Pokémon to breed after they have been fed the max amount of proteins for that region unlock. Note that this ignored event Pokémon and does not take into account the reduced damage output for Pokémon in non-native regions. ==== Kanto ==== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" ! scope="col" | PokéDex || scope="col" | Pokémon || scope="col" | Attack Gain || scope="col" | Egg Steps || scope="col" | Breeding

from the Indigo Plateau / Pokémon League, the price for Protein rises irreversibly, similar to [[Pokéballs|Masterballs]]. It starts off at 10,000 {{pdollar}}, increments by a factor of 1.1 every purchase, and caps at 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} after 49 purchases. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Purchased !! Price {{pdollar}} |- | Base Price || 10,000 |- | After 5 || 16,105 |- | After 10 || 25,937 |- | After 15 || 41,772 |- | After 20 || 67,275 |- | After 25 || 108,347 |- | After 30 || 174,494 |- | After 35 || 281,024 |- | After 40 || 452,593 |- | After 45 || 728,905 |- | After 49 || 1,000,000 |} [[Category:Items]]
